full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: R&S 67 GHz FSW Analyzer Upgrade

#### Notice Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01027023
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-22
* **Closing Date and Time:** 2023-03-08T14:00:00
* **Type of Contract:** Request for Proposal

#### Tender Description

The Department of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada is soliciting proposals for the upgrade of the R&S 67 GHz FSW Analyzer. The successful bidder must deliver the upgraded analyzer on or before the requested delivery date of March 31st, 2023.

The bid solicitation is open to suppliers that have been pre-qualified under the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC with Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). Suppliers that do not already hold a Supply Arrangement in this series are not eligible to bid.

The upgraded analyzer must meet the technical specifications and standards outlined in the bid solicitation. The Department is looking for the supplier that can provide the best value for the Department.

Selected suppliers that have already been invited to submit a proposal are:

* ANIXTER CANADA INC (E60HN-16ELEC/001/HN)
* GRAYBAR CANADA E60HN-16ELEC/002/HN
* NEDCO, DIVISION OF REXAL CANADA ELECTRICAL INC E60HN-16ELEC/003/HN

#### Contracting Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Industry Canada
* **Contact Information:**
  * **Name:** Samantha Amadio
  * **Email:** [Samantha.Amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:Samantha.Amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca)
  * **Phone:** 343-542-2505

#### Tender Attachments

The bid solicitation documents, including the terms and conditions, can be accessed at the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/c4528cdb71bd8f98521d5a2fdb2c9de0/npp20230308_annex_b_english.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/22/1aa03844693d1cfd84f6532c92f2b5a3/npp20230308_annex_b
